title: The Complete Guide to Vintage Star Wars Action Figures: Reference & Price Guide
description: Collecting Star Wars memorabilia is now hotter than ever. The re-release of the Star Wars Trilogy has revived interest in collecting Star Wars artifacts dating back to the mid-1970s, and author John Kellerman has thoroughly researched all aspects of collecting the most sought after artifacts-the 3-3/4-inch action figures-and related items. In the Star Wars Vintage Action Figures Reference & Price Guide, the ultimate guide to collecting vintage Star Wars figures, you'll find standards for grading and pricing your figures as well as chapters on multi packs, proof cards, Kenner store displays and promotional items, mailers, and more!This easy-to-use guide also gives you a complete listing of carded figures available by logo, numbered back, and front-back combination, so identifying your figures will be quick and easy. And you'll find more than 650 full-color photos accompanied by detailed descriptions.If you are a serious Star Wars figure collector or are interested in beginning a collection, you'll want the guide that will give you the edge in collecting the hottest, most popular area of Star Wars memorabilia.-- The most comprehensive guide to collecting classic Star Wars figures-- Up-to-date prices for 750 items
author: John Kellerman
